channel.title: CVE Feed for SteelThemes -- Nioland - SaaS & Software Startup Tech WordPress Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SteelThemes -- Nioland - SaaS & Software Startup Tech WordPress Theme

item.title: CVE-2024-10250|2024-10-24T13:14:44.859Z -- steelthemes -- nioland%20-%20saas%20%26%20software%20startup%20tech%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: The Nioland theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘s’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-10250|2024-10-23T13:58:40.528Z -- steelthemes -- nioland%20-%20saas%20%26%20software%20startup%20tech%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: The Nioland theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘s’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
